channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel Remote Keyboard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel Remote Keyboard

item.title: CVE-2018-3645|2024-08-05T04:50:29.096Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20remote%20keyboard
item.description: Escalation of privilege in all versions of the Intel Remote Keyboard allows a local attacker to inject keystrokes into another remote keyboard session.

item.title: CVE-2018-3638|2024-08-05T04:50:30.327Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20remote%20keyboard
item.description: Escalation of privilege in all versions of the Intel Remote Keyboard allows an authorized local attacker to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user.

item.title: CVE-2018-3641|2024-08-05T04:50:30.113Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20remote%20keyboard
item.description: Escalation of privilege in all versions of the Intel Remote Keyboard allows a network attacker to inject keystrokes as a local user.
